title: London/City of London
name: Museum of London
address: London Wall (NB: this is a street!)
directions: tube: Barbican (walk S) or St Pauls (walk N)
price: Permanent and temporary exhibitions: free. Special exhibitions: £5, concession £3, child 0-15 free
content: Established in 1975, the Museum of London explores the various threads of London's archaeology, history and culture throughout its more than 2,000 year old existence. Free and–like the City–endlessly fascinating! (The Museum now also has an offshoot in [[London/East End|East End]].) Cafe, gift shop and disabled access.
